climbs.name: Cast In The Shadows
climbs.fa: Brent Kertzman and Mike Miller 1992 Ground Up

content.description: Starts on the SE corner of the formation.  Work the short crack flake to its end. Work small awkward often sharp crystals. To a high first bolt. Going from the 1st bolt to the 2nd bolt felt the crux. Use good smearing on tiny holds and go for the small run out.  Mantle onto the ledge and take a good rest. Clip the 3rd bolt and make some delicate moves to the summit.
content.protection: 3 bolts on route. 2 bolt chain anchor.     Guidebooks say 4...?

content.description: Directly behind Stonehenge is a spire that looks like an easy slab. Look for bolts. I believe From The Dark Ages (5.11 7 bolts) has been removed unless otherwise stated. Get ready for hard awkward crystal pinching,
